name: Next.js 14
description: React framework with App Router, TypeScript support, and full-stack capabilities
reasoning: Chosen for its excellent TypeScript support, App Router architecture, built-in optimization, and strong ecosystem

name: TypeScript
description: Strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript
reasoning: Essential for large-scale application development, provides excellent IDE support and catches errors at compile time

name: Tailwind CSS
description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern websites
reasoning: Enables rapid UI development with consistent design system and excellent developer experience

name: React 18
description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces with concurrent features
reasoning: Industry standard for UI development with excellent ecosystem and performance characteristics

name: Lucide React
description: Beautiful & consistent icon library with React components
reasoning: Clean, consistent icons that match our Nordic design aesthetic

name: Mermaid
description: JavaScript library for creating diagrams and flowcharts from text
reasoning: Enables dynamic diagram generation from text, perfect for architecture documentation

name: Node.js
description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine
reasoning: Unified JavaScript ecosystem, excellent for API development and data processing

name: Bun Runtime
description: Fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime, bundler, test runner, and package manager
reasoning: 30x faster package management and excellent TypeScript support for development workflow

name: PostgreSQL
description: Advanced open-source relational database with JSON support and extensions
reasoning: Robust ACID compliance, excellent JSON support, and pgvector extension for future AI features

name: Prisma ORM
description: Type-safe database client with migrations and introspection
reasoning: Excellent TypeScript integration and database schema management

name: Docker
description: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers
reasoning: Consistent development and deployment environments across team and infrastructure

name: GitHub Actions
description: CI/CD platform that automates build, test, and deployment workflows
reasoning: Integrated with our GitHub repository, excellent for TypeScript/Node.js workflows

name: Vercel
description: Frontend cloud platform optimized for Next.js applications
reasoning: Seamless Next.js deployment with excellent performance and developer experience

name: Sentry
description: Application monitoring platform for error tracking and performance monitoring
reasoning: Comprehensive error tracking with excellent React/Next.js integration

name: Grafana
description: Analytics and monitoring platform for visualizing metrics and logs
reasoning: Advanced metrics visualization and alerting capabilities

name: Figma
description: Collaborative design platform for UI/UX design and prototyping
reasoning: Industry standard for collaborative design with excellent developer handoff features

name: Storybook
description: Tool for building UI components and pages in isolation
reasoning: Essential for component-driven development and design system documentation

name: Vitest
description: Fast unit testing framework powered by Vite with Jest compatibility
reasoning: Excellent TypeScript support and significantly faster than Jest for our use case

name: React Testing Library
description: Testing utilities for React components focused on user behavior
reasoning: Promotes best testing practices by focusing on user interactions rather than implementation details

name: Playwright
description: End-to-end testing framework for modern web applications
reasoning: Comprehensive browser testing with excellent debugging capabilities and CI integration
